summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 4.4°C) and outside temperature (down 4.1°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 697 m), and light levels (up 4631 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 1645 m), and light levels (up 6606 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 697.2m lower than yesterday, 614.0m lower than the past week, 1645.2m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 1059m to 3380m and averaged 1027.0m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.
cloud levels.summary: Partial cloudiness with some periods of sun.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; moderate and mild. Also, air moisture should feel ok. Possible light showers, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and bright intervals likely. Weather could become unsettled.
